Bernie Sanders , of Vermont, who is seeking re-election next year, distributed a fundraising appeal to constituents that detailed threats against Arizona Democratic lawmakers in addition to Gabrielle Giffords . It asked whether right-wing reactionaries, through threats and acts of violence, intimidated people with different points of view from expressing their political positions in the state. On Monday, Dwaine Caraway explained that he wanted to show children at the event they can reset their lives in the right direction after bad decisions like the ones Michael Vick made. My thing is the message that it gets over to the children, and who it's coming from- someone saying, "Look, don't you do it," Dwaine Caraway said. Dwaine Caraway said what he gave Michael Vick was a ceremonial key to the city available to City Council members.
